channel.title: Israel = terrorism
channel.description: Any one of you out there who supports or sympathises with Israel therefore supports or sympathises with terrorism. Don't bother replying or discussing it, I don't want to hear any of you trying to justify Israel's actions in any way bacause they cannot be justified.

it was palistine that started this whole thing once the UK divided up palinstine into 2 half for israe and half for palistine. To help invade Israel. The war lasted 5days and Israel won and after they won they took 25%(around that much) more of palistine land. Then the other countries on palistine took the rest of plaistine land, so they were left with nm. It wasnt the Israels fault it was the palistines fault for trying to take over Israel

o rly like the muslims counquered the middle east pyro? didnt u know that u guys conquered places and forced em to islam? look at other peoples point of view because no religion is all perfect… learn some history before u say bullshit

Under the ruling of islam when a city or country is conquered, everyone is allowed to practise their religions so long as they obey the islamic law they are free. Law not meaning religion, just law. Have you ever heard of saladin?

If you look at the history of the holy land, everytime it was controlled by christians or jews, the other two religions not in power would have most of their people slaughtered. Right now israel is slaughtering people even outside it’s territory. No palestinian is allowed to enter israel at all. I say under arab or muslim control there will be peace.

Denie this if you like but dont support your argument with things like “I couldnt care less” I understand that would be an opinion but this section is for debates and disscusions.
[/quote]

item.title: Israel = terrorism
item.dc:creator: @briatwork briatwork
item.description:
@briatwork wrote:

Official death figures so far:

459 Lebanese murdered by the state of Israel (helped by US bombs)
51 Israelis murdered by the unofficial peoples army of Lebanon (85% support)

Israel have also attacked and killed UN observers, and only today attacked a humanitarian medical convoy.
In addition hundreds of thousands of Lebanese have been displaced from there war torn towns and villages.
I am a christian, yet I am ashamed of Israel, and firmly stand by this threads title.

item.title: Israel = terrorism
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[QUOTE]When somebodies brother murders 6,000 citizens of your country, you don’t just let that motherfucker walk out of your country without questioning him, or talking to him, or whatever. But not only did we let Osama’s brother out of the country, we let TWO DOZEN of Osamas family members go.
http://www.nationalreview.com/york/york091102.asp
[/QUOTE]

question them? maybe. Blow them up regardless of who they are? absolutly not.

Well really. Israel have been terriosts ever since they claimed that piece of land now known as israel. It was once known as palistine (sp) and israel terriorised and invaded and claimed it as there own. So then palistine were the outsiders. So they did terriost acts and then they got condemned etc but no one really remembers that it was there land in the first place. But really. When many civillians are killed. It is a terriost action not a war.

Some palestinians still have the keys to their old homes. I have seen a real one.

item.title: Israel = terrorism
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

2. Just because their related doesnt mean they like each other Big Grin. 3. Im related to a lot of people that I dont know.

Ok, yeah. But when the US blames the a terrorist act on somebody, and our presidents father was meeting with that guys brother, and we have many of his family members here in the US, why do we let them fly out of the country without interrogating them?

When somebodies brother murders 6,000 citizens of your country, you don’t just let that motherfucker walk out of your country without questioning him, or talking to him, or whatever. But not only did we let Osama’s brother out of the country, we let TWO DOZEN of Osamas family members go.
http://www.nationalreview.com/york/york091102.asp

Meanwhile, as the hordes of Osama Bin Laden relatives who apparantly have no knowledge of Osamas existence and his lucrative business of blowing up American assets and are not connected with terrorists in any way are set free to head back home, we start detaining hundreds and hundreds of people for question as the massive 9/11 investigation begins.

Hmm, I’m no motherfucking detective, but if your looking for someone, don’t you start by asking the family members? If I was the president of a nation recently attacked, 6000 dead, I would tell my intelligence officers to start cutting of toes and ears, untill we got news of where the mother fucker who did this could be found.

Those pictures are intense, regaurdless of thier origin.

Obviously you’ve never been to Ogrish.com that shit, that, is intense.

Read full topic

item.title: Israel = terrorism
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Lebnon deserved it point closed they had ties with Hezbolah

Nobody deserves death.

brita shut up and look at israels casualties too ok. i dont wanna hear about u again saying that lthe lebanese are losing people israel are losing people too now shut up

Isreal is losing people? When a nation decides to go to war, it does not lose it’s people, it throws them away like garbage.

Lebnon deserved it point closed they had ties with Hezbolah

George Bush Sr. has ties to Osama Bin Ladens family. Why don’t you do some research. What the fuck is “Lebnon” anyway. Is it people of the nation of lebanon? Did every single person in Lebanon have ties with Hezbolla? Obviously not since Hezbolla is a terrorist organization funded and supported by Iran, operating in Lebanon. It’s like saying “Iraq had ties to 9/11” A country itself can’t have ties with anyone.

Isreal is sending a strong message by iniating countless airstrikes, killing Lebanese civilians accidentally, expanding their ground campaign, the message is, we welcome the martrys of the future. Come fuck us up.[/quote]

  1. Exactly True.
  2. Just because their related doesnt mean they like each other :D.
  3. Im related to a lot of people that I dont know.

Read full topic

item.title: Israel = terrorism
item.dc:creator: @hungry_tree hungry_tree
item.description:
@hungry_tree wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Lol, it’s kind of funny that you think Israel is terrorists. That would be like calling America terrorists because we went after Osama Bin Laden after he destroyed the world trade center. How does it make Israel terrorists if they didn’t attack first?

pault is right the dfinition of terrorism is:The unlawful use or threatened use of force or violence by a person or an organized group against people or property with the intention of intimidating or coercing societies or governments, often for ideological or political reasons. which was exactly what israel did, they commited war crimes there for making it unlawful and they tried to coerce lebanon into backing down.

Are you kidding me? Bombing Lebanons airport, bombing civilian areas of Lebanon…etc…Those weren’t terorrist acts?[/quote]
